marklogic.body: Joebob said:  "....Hallow, did you mention TW in your comment to George?  I sure don't see it! and I quote you: "But you did George...and you know it....you're sly style doesn't slip past most in here" Where is the mention of George???..." JoeBob, yes he did: "...Tiger has played with Colds before and allergies at Augusta....anyone knows a bad case of allergies feels just like the Flu. However, a mild strain of the achilles (he didn't know what it was at the time...tightness, some pain, and swelling) of an area that helped keep you out for almost 3 months last year 2 - 3 weeks prior to the masters is a whole other story. Most people in the golf community - analysts, PGA tour XM guys who follow along on course said it was the smart thing to do. ...." OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOPPPPPPPPPSSSSSSS Joebob got caught L-M-A-O
